articles.title: How Sydney's beaches became a 'perfect storm' for sharks - BBC
articles.description: Human-shark encounters in Australia are rising - but experts are keen to point out it isn't the animals' fault.
articles.content:
There are manifold reasons why recorded shark encounters are rising in Australia's oceans - but fatalities are relatively rare
It's "extraordinary", says shark researcher Chris Pepin-Neff: four shar… [+6797 chars]
